attributes.action: Petition Her Majesty The Queen to Immediately Dissolve Parliament and hold a General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition Her Majesty The Queen to Dissolve Parliament ,Immediately,and hold a general election implementing the principle of proportional representation. this is needed due to the disgusting lack of morality and judgement of the members of the house of commons these people have not the morality to govern themselves let alone anyone else this house should be immediately dissolved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
